Pre-Game Insights: Germany and Hungary face each other in the first match of the UEFA Nations League in League A, Group 3.
Hungary managed to finish unbeaten in the two games in which it recorded a 1-0 victory in the return leg and a result of tie, score 1-1 in the round match.
The most recent direct confrontation took place this year at Euro 2024, where Germany won 2-0 and won group A, while Hungary was in 3rd place.
Miscellaneous Highlights: SELECTION ODD FOR THIS BET IS: 1.55
